languages.text: {n}Владайм делает попытку подняться, но задерживается и со значением смотрит на вас.{/n} "И еще кое-что, как знак моей к вам симпатии. Кьява Гамма — это мир из вашего протектората, не так ли? До Футфола доходят слухи о крупных неприятностях в этой колонии. К нам прибыл корабль оттуда, и о команде ходят совершенно безумные слухи. Возможно, вас заинтересуют новости о вашей собственности".

traits.locale_text: {n}Владайм делает попытку подняться, но задерживается и со значением смотрит на вас.{/n} "И еще кое-что, как знак моей к вам симпатии. Кьява Гамма — это мир из вашей торговой империи, не так ли? До Футфола доходят слухи о крупных неприятностях в этой колонии. К нам прибыл корабль оттуда, и о команде ходят совершенно безумные слухи. Возможно, вас заинтересуют новости о вашей собственности".

languages.text: {n}Vladaym moves to stand up, but then pauses and gives you a look.{/n} "One more thing, as a gesture of my sympathy for you. Kiava Gamma — that world belongs to your protectorate, doesn't it? Footfall has heard rumours of some great trouble brewing in that colony. A ship arrived from there, and people are saying some utterly nonsensical things about the crew. Perhaps you'll be interested in hearing news about your property."
languages.original_text: {n}Владайм делает попытку подняться, но задерживается и со значением смотрит на вас.{/n} "И еще кое-что, как знак моей к вам симпатии. Кьява Гамма — это мир из вашего протектората, не так ли? До Футфола доходят слухи о крупных неприятностях в этой колонии. К нам прибыл корабль оттуда, и о команде ходят совершенно безумные слухи. Возможно, вас заинтересуют новости о вашей собственности".

Kiava Gamma — that world belongs to your trade empire, isn't it? Footfall has heard rumors of some great trouble brewing in that colony. A ship arrived from there, and people are saying some utterly nonsensical things about the crew. Perhaps you'll be interested in hearing news about your property."

Perhaps you'll be interested in hearing news about your property."

{n}Vladaym moves to stand up, but then pauses and gives you a look.{/n} "One more thing, as a gesture of my sympathy for you. Kiava Gamma — that world belongs to your protectorate, doesn't it? Footfall has heard rumours of some great trouble brewing in that colony. A ship arrived from there, and people are saying some utterly nonsensical things about the crew. Perhaps you'll be interested in hearing news about your property."

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは立ち上がろうとするが、ピタリと止まりこちらへ視線を向ける。{/n}「同情の印にもうひとつ。キアヴァ・ガンマ…あの惑星は君の保護領だな？フットフォールでは、あのコロニーで大変な問題が起きているという噂を聞く。そこから船が到着したのだが、皆口々にそこのクルーについてまったく馬鹿げた事を言うのだ。きっと君は、あの保護領に関する知らせを聞きたいのではないか」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym moves to stand up, but then pauses and gives you a look.{/n} "One more thing, as a gesture of my sympathy for you. Kiava Gamma — that world belongs to your protectorate, doesn't it? Footfall has heard rumours of some great trouble brewing in that colony. A ship arrived from there, and people are saying some utterly nonsensical things about the crew. Perhaps you'll be interested in hearing news about your property."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは立ち上がろうとするが、ピタリと止まりこちらへ視線を向ける。{/n}「同情の印にもうひとつ。キアヴァ・ガンマ…あの惑星は君の保護領だな？フットフォールでは、あのコロニーで大変な問題が起きているという噂を聞く。そこから船が到着したのだが、皆口々にそこのクルーについてまったく馬鹿げた事を言うのだ。きっと君は、あの保護領に関する知らせを聞きたいのではないか」

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆准备站起身来，但随后停下了动作，看了你一眼。{/n}“还有一件事我得告诉您，请允许我对您致以同情。基亚瓦伽马星，那个世界是您的属地，对吧？落脚港里流传着流言，说那个殖民地里爆发了一场可怕的动乱。有一艘从那里来的船到了落脚港，对于船上的人，也流传着荒诞不经的闲言碎语。或许您会有兴趣打听打听关于您财产的消息。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym moves to stand up, but then pauses and gives you a look.{/n} "One more thing, as a gesture of my sympathy for you. Kiava Gamma — that world belongs to your protectorate, doesn't it? Footfall has heard rumours of some great trouble brewing in that colony. A ship arrived from there, and people are saying some utterly nonsensical things about the crew. Perhaps you'll be interested in hearing news about your property."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆准备站起身来，但随后停下了动作，看了你一眼。{/n}“还有一件事我得告诉您，请允许我对您致以同情。基亚瓦伽马星，那个世界是您的属地，对吧？落脚港里流传着流言，说那个殖民地里爆发了一场可怕的动乱。有一艘从那里来的船到了落脚港，对于船上的人，也流传着荒诞不经的闲言碎语。或许您会有兴趣打听打听关于您财产的消息。”

languages.text: {n}Vladaym se levanta, pero se detiene y te mira.{/n} «Una cosa más, como muestra de mi simpatía hacia usted. Kiava Gamma forma parte de su protectorado, ¿verdad? A Paso llegan rumores de que en esa colonia se está fraguando algo gordo. Una nave ha arribado de allí y la gente está diciendo barbaridades sobre la tripulación. Tal vez le interese oír noticias sobre su propiedad».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym moves to stand up, but then pauses and gives you a look.{/n} "One more thing, as a gesture of my sympathy for you. Kiava Gamma — that world belongs to your protectorate, doesn't it? Footfall has heard rumours of some great trouble brewing in that colony. A ship arrived from there, and people are saying some utterly nonsensical things about the crew. Perhaps you'll be interested in hearing news about your property."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym se levanta, pero se detiene y te mira.{/n} «Una cosa más, como muestra de mi simpatía hacia usted. Kiava Gamma forma parte de su protectorado, ¿verdad? A Paso llegan rumores de que en esa colonia se está fraguando algo gordo. Una nave ha arribado de allí y la gente está diciendo barbaridades sobre la tripulación. Tal vez le interese oír noticias sobre su propiedad».

languages.text: {n}Vladaym commence à se lever, mais s'interrompt et vous lance un regard.{/n} « Une dernière chose, en gage de ma sympathie à votre égard. Kiava Gamma appartient à votre protectorat, n'est-ce pas ? La situation là-bas est inquiétante, si l'on en croit le bruit qui court à Castel. Nous avons reçu un vaisseau en provenance de cette colonie, et son équipage fait l'objet de rumeurs proprement absurdes dans la station. Vous voudrez peut-être en profiter pour prendre des nouvelles de votre propriété. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym moves to stand up, but then pauses and gives you a look.{/n} "One more thing, as a gesture of my sympathy for you. Kiava Gamma — that world belongs to your protectorate, doesn't it? Footfall has heard rumours of some great trouble brewing in that colony. A ship arrived from there, and people are saying some utterly nonsensical things about the crew. Perhaps you'll be interested in hearing news about your property."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym commence à se lever, mais s'interrompt et vous lance un regard.{/n} « Une dernière chose, en gage de ma sympathie à votre égard. Kiava Gamma appartient à votre protectorat, n'est-ce pas ? La situation là-bas est inquiétante, si l'on en croit le bruit qui court à Castel. Nous avons reçu un vaisseau en provenance de cette colonie, et son équipage fait l'objet de rumeurs proprement absurdes dans la station. Vous voudrez peut-être en profiter pour prendre des nouvelles de votre propriété. »

languages.text: {n}Vladaym will aufstehen, hält dann aber inne und seht dich an.{/n} "Eines noch, als Geste meiner Sympathie für Euch. Kiava Gamma – diese Welt gehört zu Eurem Protektorat, richtig? Auf Footfall kursieren Gerüchte, dass in der Kolonie großer Ärger brodelt. Ein Schiff von dort ist eingetroffen, und es werden völlig unsinnige Dinge über die Crew behauptet. Vielleicht interessieren Euch Neuigkeiten über Euren Besitz."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym moves to stand up, but then pauses and gives you a look.{/n} "One more thing, as a gesture of my sympathy for you. Kiava Gamma — that world belongs to your protectorate, doesn't it? Footfall has heard rumours of some great trouble brewing in that colony. A ship arrived from there, and people are saying some utterly nonsensical things about the crew. Perhaps you'll be interested in hearing news about your property."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym will aufstehen, hält dann aber inne und seht dich an.{/n} "Eines noch, als Geste meiner Sympathie für Euch. Kiava Gamma – diese Welt gehört zu Eurem Protektorat, richtig? Auf Footfall kursieren Gerüchte, dass in der Kolonie großer Ärger brodelt. Ein Schiff von dort ist eingetroffen, und es werden völlig unsinnige Dinge über die Crew behauptet. Vielleicht interessieren Euch Neuigkeiten über Euren Besitz."

languages.text: {n}Vladaym ayağa kalkmak üzere hareketleniyor, sonrasında durup sana bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Size duyduğum sempatinin bir göstergesi olarak son bir şey ekleyecektim. Kiava Gama, protektoranıza aitti değil mi? Binliman'a o kolonide bazı büyük sorunların patlak verdiğine dair söylentiler ulaştı. Oradan bir gemi geldi. İnsanlar mürettebat hakkında akla hayale sığmaz şeyler söylüyor. Mülkünüzden haber almak isteyebilirsiniz diye düşündüm."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym moves to stand up, but then pauses and gives you a look.{/n} "One more thing, as a gesture of my sympathy for you. Kiava Gamma — that world belongs to your protectorate, doesn't it? Footfall has heard rumours of some great trouble brewing in that colony. A ship arrived from there, and people are saying some utterly nonsensical things about the crew. Perhaps you'll be interested in hearing news about your property."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym ayağa kalkmak üzere hareketleniyor ama sonra durup sana bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Size olan minnettarlığımın bir göstergesi olarak son bir şey ekleyecektim. Kiava Gama sizin protektoranıza aitti değil mi? Binliman'a, o kolonide bazı büyük sorunların patlak verdiğine dair söylentiler ulaştı. Oradan bir gemi geldi ve insanlar mürettebat hakkında akla hayale sığmaz şeyler söylüyor. Mülkünüzden haber almak isteyebilirsiniz diye düşündüm."
